TABLE.NAME: amos_repository
TABLE.COMMENT: All Moodle strings and their history

FIELD.NAME: commitid
FIELD.COMMENT: The commit thatt introduced this change

FIELD.NAME: branch
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the branch this string is valid for

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the language this string belongs to. Like en, cs or es

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the component this string belongs to. Like moodle or workshopform_accumulative

FIELD.NAME: stringid
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the string

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The effective timestamp of the change

FIELD.NAME: timeupdated
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when this string has been marked as up-to-date.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Is the string deleted? If not, it will be generated into the lang packs

INDEX.NAME: ix_snapshot
INDEX.COMMENT: Optimised for getting a snapshot of all current strings in one component

INDEX.NAME: ix_lang
INDEX.COMMENT: For getting a list of all known components. In some cases, we need to filter English records only

INDEX.NAME: ix_timemodified
INDEX.COMMENT: This index allows to search for the recent records in the log output

TABLE.NAME: amos_snapshot
TABLE.COMMENT: Snapshot of most recent string versions

FIELD.NAME: branch
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the branch this string is valid for

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the language this string belongs to. Like en, cs or es

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the component this string belongs to. Like moodle or workshopform_accumulative

FIELD.NAME: stringid
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the string

FIELD.NAME: repoid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the record in the amos_repository table that represents the most recent version of this string.

INDEX.NAME: ix_lang
INDEX.COMMENT: For getting a list of all known components. In some cases, we need to filter English records only

FIELD.NAME: source
FIELD.COMMENT: The source of this string - git, email etc.

FIELD.NAME: timecommitted
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of the commit

FIELD.NAME: commitmsg
FIELD.COMMENT: Commit message

FIELD.NAME: commithash
FIELD.COMMENT: The git commit hash that introduced this string

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: If the author is known in the local user table, store their id here

FIELD.NAME: userinfo
FIELD.COMMENT: Helps to identify the author of the change, for example a name from CVS commit

TABLE.NAME: amos_translators
TABLE.COMMENT: Gives the user the right to commit into a given language

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the translator's user account

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The language code that the translator is allowed to translate, or asterisk for all languages.

TABLE.NAME: amos_stashes
TABLE.COMMENT: Keeps the information about the stashes in the stashpool

FIELD.NAME: ownerid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user who owns this stash

FIELD.NAME: hash
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique hash of the content that servers as the filename

FIELD.NAME: languages
FIELD.COMMENT: List of languages that are contained in the stashed stage

FIELD.NAME: components
FIELD.COMMENT: List of components that are stored in the stashed stage

FIELD.NAME: strings
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of strings in the stashed stage

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of then the stash was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the record was recently modified

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name or title of the stash

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: The full message describing the stash. It is used as the default commit message when the stash is pullreguested.

TABLE.NAME: amos_greylist
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines the strings that were greylisted, that is they were marked as candidates for removal in the next release.

FIELD.NAME: branch
FIELD.COMMENT: Branch code

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: Component name of the string

FIELD.NAME: stringid
FIELD.COMMENT: The string identifier

FIELD.NAME: authorid
FIELD.COMMENT: User who contributed

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the language this contribution belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: assignee
FIELD.COMMENT: The maintainer who is supposed to merge this or NULL if not assigned

FIELD.NAME: subject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject of the contributed submission

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: Initial message describing the submission

FIELD.NAME: stashid
FIELD.COMMENT: Attached stash

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The workflow status of the contribution

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the contribution record was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the contribution record was recently modified

TABLE.NAME: amos_filter_usage
TABLE.COMMENT: Log of AMOS translator filter usage

FIELD.NAME: timesubmitted
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the filter form was submitted

FIELD.NAME: sesskey
FIELD.COMMENT: The current user's sesskey

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User's id

FIELD.NAME: userlang
FIELD.COMMENT: User's preferred language from their profile

FIELD.NAME: currentlang
FIELD.COMMENT: The current session language as returned by current_language()

FIELD.NAME: usercountry
FIELD.COMMENT: User's country code as selected in their profile

FIELD.NAME: ismaintainer
FIELD.COMMENT: Does the user have permission to commit to the AMOS repository

FIELD.NAME: usesdefaultversion
FIELD.COMMENT: Did the user use the pre-selected versions in the form?

FIELD.NAME: usesdefaultlang
FIELD.COMMENT: Did the user use the pre-selected languages?

FIELD.NAME: numofversions
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of selected versions

FIELD.NAME: numoflanguages
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of selected languages

FIELD.NAME: numofcomponents
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of selected components

FIELD.NAME: showmissingonly
FIELD.COMMENT: Should only missing and outdated strings be displayed?

FIELD.NAME: showhelpsonly
FIELD.COMMENT: Should only help strings be displayed?

FIELD.NAME: withsubstring
FIELD.COMMENT: Was a substring to search for specified?

FIELD.NAME: substringregex
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the substring be considered as a regex?

FIELD.NAME: substringcasesensitive
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the substring be considered as case sensitive?

FIELD.NAME: withstringid
FIELD.COMMENT: Was the stringid specified?

FIELD.NAME: stringidpartial
FIELD.COMMENT: Is partial match for stringid requested?

FIELD.NAME: showstagedonly
FIELD.COMMENT: Should only staged strings be displayed?

FIELD.NAME: showgreylistedonly
FIELD.COMMENT: Should only greylisted string be displayed?

FIELD.NAME: showwithoutgreylisted
FIELD.COMMENT: Should greylisted strings be removed from the results?

FIELD.NAME: page
FIELD.COMMENT: The current page of results to be displayed

TABLE.NAME: amos_texts
TABLE.COMMENT: The storage of the actual string values

FIELD.NAME: texthash
FIELD.COMMENT: SHA1 hash of the string value

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The actual textual value of a string
